desc: Polymer clay, handmade jewelry created in Tucson, AZ. Beautiful and unique pieces that are also lightweight and durable. These pieces are timeless with a modern and contemporary touch. All pieces are of quality and made with the utmost attention to detail. All for an affordable price. Get your Luna and Saya earrings!

layout.text: chez peachy x luna & saya Collab

releasing August 6th at 12p MST
introducing FAKE cake trinkets, hair accessories, earrings, & more!
